name: Modern Standard Korean III
description: As a continuation of EAS210Y1 and EAS211Y1, this course is designed to help students improve their Korean proficiency at the intermediate level. The class focuses not only on oral fluency and grammar but also on reading comprehension. Students who do not meet the prerequisite must go through placement process conducted by Department. See www.eas.utoronto.ca/languages/korean for details.
prerequisites: EAS210Y1/EAS211Y1/EAS212H1 (67% minimum)/equivalent as determined by placement process
